title.narrative: Seminar on Vietnam-EU FTA's implications for policy and institutional reform

description.narrative: Given the imminent signing of the VN-EU FTA agreement amid low awareness among VN companies and the public about the FTA, CIEM and the Embassy found it timely and useful to organize an international seminar to open up discussion for policy makers, donors, scholars, foreign investors, businesses about potential needs for internal and external policies and institutional changes in the future due to the EU-VN FTA commitments. The seminar is also expected to feed a separate and full-fledged research on VN-EU FTA's implications for policy and institutional reform with more comprehensive and high- quality inputs. The seminar focuses on the following issues: (1) International experiences in policy and institution adjustment to implement FTAs, particularly the experiences from developing countries who has FTA with EU; (2) Preliminary assessment on the readiness and institutional and policy adjustment needs of Vietnam to implement this agreement.
